block.p: BONGIOVANNI-Anthony. On September 18, 2000 of Lyndhurst, NJ. Beloved brother of Nancy Porro and Emil Bongiovanni. Funeral Saturday 9 A.M. from the IppolitoStellato Funeral Home, 425 Ridge Road, Lyndhurst, NJ. Funeral Mass 10 A.M. Sacred Heart R.C. Church, Lyndhurst, NJ. Entombment Holy Cross Chapel Mausoleum, N. Arlington, NJ. Friends will be received Friday 2-4 & 7-9 P.M. Donations may be made ''in memory of Anthony Bongiovanni'' to: Sacred Heart R.C. Church, 324 Ridge Rd, Lyndhurst, NJ 07071.
